text: @realDonaldTrump A Fox News poll shows Trump's overall approval rating now at 44 percent — down from 49 percent in April and 48 percent in March. By comparison, the Fox News poll has Dr. Anthony Fauci's coronavirus handling at 74 percent, respondents' state governments at 70 percent.
